videos.content: Shaitaan Theme (Song) | Shaitaan | Ajay Devgn, R. Madhavan, Jyotika | Amit T, Kumaar, Siddharth B
Shaitaan Theme (Song) | Shaitaan | Ajay Devgn, R. Madhavan, Jyotika | Amit T, Kumaar, Siddharth B

videos.text: Text-to-speech feature is now available on relatively any website or blog. It's a game changer that you can listen to the content instead of reading it. Especially effective for people with visual or cognitive impairments or people who are on the go. I came up with the idea to implement it for my blog, so this is how I started doing a research on this topic which ended up being a tutorial for you. So in this tutorial, we will go through the process of building a text-to-speech component in React. We will use the Web Speech API to implement the text-to-speech functionality.
Let start from here second slide
